name: VIRTUAnimator
description: VIRUTAnimator is a fun and easy animation tool for VR. It allows anyone to easily create animated scenes by simply moving objects in virtual space with supported motion controllers. Share your animations, or get more objects to work with from the Steam Workshop!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel® i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better Additional Notes: A VR-Ready rig is minimum recommended. You might be able to go lower, but you'll probably lose frames.
